should add heading anchor (simple)
.
# test
.
<h1 id="test"><a name="test" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>test</h1>
.


should add anchors to multiple headings
.
# head 1

some para text

## head 2

more para text
.
<h1 id="head%201"><a name="head%201" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>head 1</h1>
<p>some para text</p>
<h2 id="head%202"><a name="head%202" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>head 2</h2>
<p>more para text</p>
.


should cope with fairly complex heading text
.
##### a _b_ **c** `d`
.
<h5 id="a%20_b_%20**c**%20%60d%60"><a name="a%20_b_%20**c**%20%60d%60" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>a <em>b</em> <strong>c</strong> <code>d</code></h5>
.


should add anchors to headings within other block elements
.
> # head 1
>
> some para text
>
> ## head 2
>
> more para text
.
<blockquote>
<h1 id="head%201"><a name="head%201" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>head 1</h1>
<p>some para text</p>
<h2 id="head%202"><a name="head%202" class="markdown-it-headinganchor" href="#"></a>head 2</h2>
<p>more para text</p>
</blockquote>
.
